page.title: 19ENTERTAINMENT
page.content: What do you think of entertainment in Normanton ? 2 people very good. 10 good. 9 quite good. 26 poor.18 very poor. What type of entertainment would you like to see in Normanton? 43% cinema.22% disco.21% restaurant.12% theatre.2% pizza-house. What goods do you buy outside of Normanton? 44 people clothes.15 large food order. 11 presents.9 electrical goods.Other typesof shops preffered in Wakefield or Leeds were :sports.large covered shoping complexes exist in these two cities offering a pleasant enviroment in which to shop. The costumer is given a wider choice of goods than is available in Normanton.
